hymn.title: In the church life we can see
hymn.category: The Church—As Our Home and Rest

layout.singingstanza: In the church life we can see We are God's own fam -- i -- ly. As we blend with the saints We are built up in love, His ex -- pres -- sion thus to be. In the church we are home; Here our joy has be -- gun. In this sweet fel -- low -- ship We are built up in love As the man -- y, yet as one.

lyrics.stanza: In the church life we can see We are God's own family. As we blend with the saints We are built up in love, His expression thus to be.
In the church we are home; Here our joy has begun. In this sweet fellowship We are built up in love As the many, yet as one.
In each member we can see Our God in humanity; As each functions in life, Christ is then manifest Through His Body practic'ly.
As we gather we can see One expression, corp'rately; As His Body on earth, Now Christ's riches we share In the church life, heavenly!
